content.en: Encryption Algorithms: Researchers have addressed various research questions in the development and evaluation of encryption algorithms. The National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) has played a significant role in the development of the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES). Other research questions include the performance evaluation of encryption algorithms, the motivation behind the design of specific algorithms, and the analysis and modification of classical encryption schemes. However, the agency of algorithms in most of these research questions is not specified.
content.da: Krypteringsalgoritmer: Forskere har adresseret forskellige forskningsspørgsmål i udviklingen og evalueringen af krypteringsalgoritmer. National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) har spillet en betydelig rolle i udviklingen af Advanced Encryption Standard (AES). Andre forskningsspørgsmål inkluderer præstationsevalueringen af krypteringsalgoritmer, motivationen bag designet af specifikke algoritmer og analysen og modifikationen af klassiske krypteringsskemaer. Dog er agenturen af algoritmer i de fleste af disse forskningsspørgsmål ikke specificeret.
